name: Bridger Aerospace Group, Inc.
description: Bridger Aerospace Group, Inc. is a leading provider of aerial firefighting and related aviation services. Founded in 2014, the company specializes in utilizing advanced aircraft and technology to deliver effective wildfire management solutions. With a fleet of modern, multi-mission aircraft, Bridger Aerospace is at the forefront of innovative firefighting techniques, leveraging its expertise to protect natural resources, infrastructure, and communities from the devastating effects of wildfires. The company's services include aerial suppression, reconnaissance, and support for ground firefighting efforts, ensuring a comprehensive approach to wildfire management. Bridger Aerospace is committed to enhancing the safety and effectiveness of firefighting operations through continuous improvement and the integration of new technologies. The company’s mission extends to fostering community resilience against wildfires and promoting sustainable practices in the aviation industry. By collaborating with government agencies and firefighting organizations, Bridger Aerospace plays a critical role in safeguarding the environment and supporting emergency response efforts.
